author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens flat as gains in retail stocks offset losses in energy shares
text:
May 16 (Reuters) - Wall Street opened little changed on Wednesday as gains in retail stocks led by Macy’s offset losses in energy and financial shares.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 15.91 points, or 0.06 percent, at the open to 24,722.32.
The S&P 500 opened higher by 1.17 points, or 0.04 percent, at 2,712.62. The Nasdaq Composite gained 4.59 points, or 0.06 percent, to 7,356.22 at the opening bell. (Reporting by Medha Singh in Bengaluru; Editing by Anil D’Silva)
